verses.name: 1 Kings 2:44
verses.text: The king said moreover to Shimei, Thou knowest all the wickedness which thine heart is privy to, that thou didst to David my father: therefore the Lord shall return thy wickedness upon thine own head;

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:45
verses.text: And king Solomon shall be blessed, and the throne of David shall be established before the Lord for ever.

verses.name: 1 Kings 2:46
verses.text: So the king commanded Benaiah the son of Jehoiada; which went out, and fell upon him, that he died. And the kingdom was established in the hand of Solomon.
